subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Juan Uribe hit a decisive two-run home run in the 10th inning of a game in which the benches cleared and Giants Manager Bruce Bochy and his bench coach were ejected.
snippet: Juan Uribe hit a decisive two-run home run in the 10th inning of a game in which the benches cleared and Giants Manager Bruce Bochy and his bench coach were ejected.
